text: Phra Phutthaloetla Naphalai (Thai: พระพุทธเลิศหล้านภาลัย, 24 February 1767 – 21 July 1824), personal name Chim (Thai: ฉิม), also styled as Rama II, was the second monarch of Siam under the Chakri dynasty, ruling from 1809 to 1824 ==References== Category:1767 births Category:1824 deaths Category:Monarchs of Thailand Category:Chakri dynasty Category:19th-century Thai monarchs
title: Rama II
